page.title: 07HOLME FARM(2)
page.content: The farm also has sheep farming.The farmer has 100 ewes and 180 lambs this year (1985).They also have a sheepdog called Moss. In 1965 they had five men and today,1985,they have three men.The drop in the number of men is due to the use of machinery. The farm also has 173 acres of land.50% of the land is used for crops.The crops grown are potatoes and cereals. The old farmhouse,built of sandstone is not lived in at the moment and the farmer lives across the road in a more modern house. We liked seeing the calves,they were tame and licked your hand.We also liked seeing the sheepdog,Moss and a tup(a sheep) that had a lame leg.
